Module HW05

Package model

This package contains the model.
Author:
Peter Dulworth (psd2), Andrew Hadad (aah6)
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBallCmd
    Interface that represents commands sent through the dispatcher to process the balls.
    IInteractStrategy
    Strategy that defines a directed interaction between two balls where the balls are NOT equivalently processed.
    IM2VAdapter
    This interface defines behavior the model expects from the view.
    IPaintStrategy
    Top-level interface that represents a strategy used by a Ball when asked to perform variant paint operations.
    IPaintStrategyFac
    An interface that defines a factory that instantiates a specific IPaintStrategy.
    IUpdateStrategy<TMsg>
    The strategy that runs when a Ball updates its state.
    IUpdateStrategyFac<TMsg>
    An interface that defines a factory that instantiates a specific IUpdateStrategy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    The Ball class provides methods and fields that are common to all balls.
    BallModel
    The class that manages the creation, deletion and animation of the balls.
    IUpdateStrategyFac.ErrorFactory<TMsg>
    A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates.
    IUpdateStrategyFac.NullFactory<TMsg>
    A factory for a typed null strategy object.
    Usage: instantiate this factory class using the desired TDispMsg type and then call its make() method to create the correctly typed null strategy object.
